property.name: info
property.value:
2,0,Here is a Zombie. They are hungry
but slow and unintelligent;2,6,Zombies will follow the nearest brain to feed on.;5,3,>;14,0,As you move further away, the
zombie will return to wandering.
They will follow the nearest
living creature that is close
enough to be sensed;6,11,Survivors will flee
from nearby Zombies,
unless they are
following you.;14,18,Use your superior speed
and skill to lead this
survivor past the zombie ahead.
